name: codelab-bootstrap
description: use nodemon to watch changes on md file, rebuild codelab on saves

scripts.watch: nodemon --watch design-document-discover-develop-event-driven-apis.md --exec 'claat export design-document-discover-develop-event-driven-apis.md && lsof -c claat -t | xargs kill && cd design-document-discover-develop-event-driven-apis && claat serve'
